rooms.name: entrance_hall
rooms.description: Small vestibule providing a transitional space.

rooms.name: kitchen
rooms.description: Compact kitchen area with provisions for natural light; window openings to the front and side walls.

rooms.name: living_room
rooms.description: Open space adjacent to kitchen for dining; ample windows on north and east for natural light and ventilation.

rooms.name: bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious bedroom with south-west orientation, ensuring good ventilation and privacy.

rooms.name: library
rooms.description: Dedicated library space designed for quiet study; located near the living area to share natural light.
